question_item.name: ❌     Oil leaks
question_item.note: Look for dark spots

question_item.name: ❌     Check engine oil and coolant level
question_item.note: Remove oil dipstick, clean it with piece of paper, check again.

question_item.name: ❌     Status off V-ribbed belt
question_item.note:
Look signs of damages on the 'tracks' side.
Common belts have 4/5 tracks

question_item.name: ❌     Look for coolant leaks
question_item.note:
PSA group are green/yellow [Peugeot/Citroen]
VAG group are pink [VW/Audi]
Japanese are red [Honda/Toyota]

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     Oil leaks
question_item.note: Look for dark spots

question_item.name: ❌     Look for coolant leaks
question_item.note:
PSA group are green/yellow [Peugeot/Citroen]
VAG group are pink [VW/Audi]
Japanese are red [Honda/Toyota]

question_item.name: ❌     Check if the semi-axles are dirty
question_item.note: Check for grease leakage by a possible hole in protection part

question_item.name: ❌     Check rubber hoses for signs of cracks
question_item.note: Years of use and bad coolant could damaged the hoses

question_item.name: ❌     Check suspension triangle for deteriorated bushes
question_item.note: Bad roads may have damaged the bushes

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     While upon starting engine, check if this doesn't have troubles/struggles to start
question_item.note: Could need a new battery or have some problem in the injection system

question_item.name: ❌     Check if the engine shakes at idle
question_item.note: Could be double DMF with problems or faulty fuel injectors

question_item.name: ❌     Press the clutch pedal and feel it's smoothness
question_item.note: Upon pedal releasing pay attention for some noises inside the gearbox/engine: could be DMF

question_item.name: ❌     Check if the engine make strange noises
question_item.note:
Metallic noise could be problem inside the engine
Non metallic noise could be ribbed V-belt or V-belt tensioner

question_item.name: ❌     Observe smoke color from exhaust pipe
question_item.note:
White smoke smelless equals condensation in winter
White smoke with strong smell equals turbo or fuel injectors problem
Black smoke equals dirty air filter, faulty fuel injectors or leak in the intercooler piping

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     Check the brakes pads for weariness
question_item.note: New pads have +/- 1cm of material and worn pads like 0.5mm

question_item.name: ❌     Use your finger and feel the discs along full length, looking for irregular patterns
question_item.note: Good discs have smooth pattern

question_item.name: ❌     Look at the discs and check if cracks are visible along disc length
question_item.note: Good discs won't have any signs of that

question_item.name: ❌     Check if the discs have chunks of rust falling apart
question_item.note: Those discs have too much years of use

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     Test all electric components
question_item.note:
Power windows
Radio
Windshield wipers
Etc

question_item.name: ❌     Test the air conditioned
question_item.note: Good AC will freeze your face/fingers

question_item.name: ❌     Do some light inspection on exterior
question_item.note:
Front and tail lights
Fog lights
Etc

question_item.name: ❌     Test the car alarm and centralized locks
question_item.note: Don't forget to test the key remote

question_item.name: ❌     Check the dashboard for faults
question_item.note: Some dashes with LCD after some years have miss pixels

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     Check the body for possible dents, deep scratches and paint wear
question_item.note: All used cars have this kind of marks

question_item.name: ❌     Use different view perspectives to see if the paint has different shades
question_item.note: It's very common that previous body repairs didn't use correct paint code

question_item.name: ❌     Under the hood, check for signs of recent paint job
question_item.note: Could indicates some kind of previous huge repair

question_item.name: ❌     Check the tires for tire tread or cracks
question_item.note:
Search the DOT reference in the tire to see tire production date
Example: DOT AF WD9E 0517, 05 equals week and 17 equals year

question_item.name: ❌     Check the status of windshield wipers
question_item.note: Wipers should be changed every years, in the fall

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     While braking see if you feel the pedal vibrating
question_item.note: The discs are worn

question_item.name: ❌     During the test drive see if the car wiggles too much while doing curves
question_item.note: Could need new shock absorbers

question_item.name: ❌     Upon the test drive, close all the windows and pay attention for some kind of buzz
question_item.note: Could have some faulty wheel bearing

question_item.name: ❌     Aware of noises near upside shock absorbers
question_item.note: Could need new parts

question_item.name: ❌     Check for noises near feet/pedals
question_item.note: Could have some problem in steering components like  triangles bushings

question_item.name: ✅     All looking good!
question_item.note: Everything it's ok

question_item.name: ❌     No thanks
✅     Yes please, notes to my self
